backbreaking-wave.name: Backbreaking Wave
backbreaking-wave.message: Tanks must position this away from the party.

black-smokers.name: Black Smokers
black-smokers.message: Tanks will take damage, and Hydrothermal Vents will spawn.

breaking-wave.name: Breaking Wave
breaking-wave.message: Tanks must position this away from the party.

drenching-pulse.name: Drenching Pulse
drenching-pulse.message: Stack with the party and rotate around Leviathan.

drenching-pulse-light.name: Drenching Pulse
drenching-pulse-light.message: Stack with the party and prepare for Freak Wave.

enrage.name: The Storm
enrage.message: Defeat Leviathan or you will die.

freak-wave.name: Freak Wave
freak-wave.message: You must position this to not overlap with any of your party.

freak-wave-enhanced.name: Freak Wave
freak-wave-enhanced.message: You must position this to not overlap with any of your party. You will drop a damage telegraph after the cast.

hydrothermal-vent.name: Hydrothermal Vent
hydrothermal-vent.message: Your party must soak these in alternating turn orders.

maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
maelstrom.message: You must avoid puddles and avoid Leviathan two times.

maelstrom-enhanced.name: Maelstrom
maelstrom-enhanced.message: You must avoid puddles and avoid Leviathan three times.

monster-wave.name: Monster Wave
monster-wave.message: Stack with the party and rotate around Leviathan.

rip-current.name: Rip Current
rip-current.message: Tanks will be hit with a targetted ability.

roiling-pulse.name: Roiling Pulse
roiling-pulse.message: Stack with the party and rotate around Leviathan.

scouring-tsunami.name: Scouring Tsunami
scouring-tsunami.message: The affected Tank will do massive Area of Effect damage.

spinning-dive.name: Spinning Dive
spinning-dive.message: Leviathan will attack in a linear telegraph.

splashing-tsunami.name: Splashing Tsunami
splashing-tsunami.message: Cleanse this debuff, or suffer lethal damage.

sundering-tsunami-1.name: Sundering Tsunami
sundering-tsunami-1.message: The affected player will do a party knockback.

sundering-tsunami-2.name: Sundering Tsunami
sundering-tsunami-2.message: The affected player will do a party knockback.

surging-tsunami.name: Surging Tsunami
surging-tsunami.message: The affected player will do a party knockback.

sweeping-tsunami.name: Sweeping Tsunami
sweeping-tsunami.message: The affected players will target the furthest player with a conal Area of Effect.

temporary-current.name: Temporary Current
temporary-current.message: Leviathan will attack in a diagonal linear damage pattern.

tidal-wave.name: Tidal Wave
tidal-wave.message: Will do a party knockback either from East or West platform.

tsunami.name: Tsunami
tsunami.message: Raid wide unavoidable damage. Affects players with Tsunami debuffs.

undersea-quake-center.name: Undersea Quake
undersea-quake-center.message: Leviathan will destroy the center of the platform.

undersea-quake-sides.name: Undersea Quake
undersea-quake-sides.message: Leviathan will destroy the East and West sides of the platform.

multiple-smothering-swirling-temporary-c.name: Smothering, Swirling & Temporary Current
multiple-smothering-swirling-temporary-c.message: Stack with the marked players on the sides of the platform.

multiple-breaking-killer-undersea-quake.name: Breaking Wave, Killer Wave & Undersea Quake
multiple-breaking-killer-undersea-quake.message: Stack with the marked players on the sides of the platform.
